message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Fair is fair!
Let's be practical Alice. Inflation is eating at our potential gains. My offer gives you a decent share without losing too much value to time.
I'm willing to compromise, Bob.  Let's split it closer to even, but still take the inflation into account.  This offer gives us both a good share.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. We're both losing out because of the inflation. I'm making my final offer, take it or leave it.
